Description: Rally2 class competes in WRC2 and regional championships, equipped with H4DPA 1.6L i4 engine, 2.5 bar anti-lag turbo with 32mm restrictor, 4WD with hydrualic shaft disengage mechanism and 5-speed sequential transmission. EVO version (from 2023) comes with update package including aero and engine curve optimizations. Tarmac spec has around 200mm of suspension travel and 355mm brake discs.
